title: How many episodes does The Grand Tour season 4 have?
text:
The grand trio of Richard Hammond, Jeremy Clarkson and James May (Picture: Amazon Prime)

The Grand Tour star Jeremy Clarkson has revealed that he has been spending most of his time in the improbable setting of a farm, teasing fans who are desperate for news about The Grand Tour season four.

Clarkson is set to return alongside long standing fellow presenters James May and Richard Hammond for a new season of the globetrotting motoring show later this year.

The popular presenter has been more interested in promoting his solo show recently, lamenting his lack of qualifications for his agricultural role.

There has been the odd snippet about the next season of The Grand Tour, though. Want to know more? Here’s what the producer behind the wheel has revealed so far…

How many episodes does The Grand Tour season 4 have?

Executive producer Andy Wilman says he has created just two episodes of The Grand Tour series four for Amazon Prime, which he expects to be screened at Christmas and in the Spring.

A new format means that each episode in the double bill will be longer than viewers are used to, and the decision to create two lengthier shows rather than several episodes is causing dismay among some fans.

Wilman added that Amazon had cut one of his edits by around half an hour, from two-and-a-quarter hours to one-and-three-quarter hours.

Earlier this year, Amazon said it was ‘proud’ that Prime Video would continue to be the home of Clarkson, May and Hammond ‘for years to come’.

Amazon added: ‘Season four will see the guys ditch the tent to take on big adventure road trips that we know Prime members love.’

The Grand Tour season 4 is expected to land on Amazon Prime Video later this year.

description: How many episodes does The Grand Tour season 4 have? Amazon Prime has a new format for Richard Hammond, Jeremy Clarkson and James May.
